getSendStatus().Description: Returns the send status of the just-sent SMS.

Returns: the message references, one for each part of the multipart SMS This value may be null.
getMessageRefs().Description: Returns the message references of the just-sent multipart SMS.

Parameters: int: send status, one of @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@, @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_RETRY_ON_CARRIER_NETWORK_E@, and @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_ERROR_E@.

int: an array of message references, one for each part of the multipart SMS. This field is applicable only if send status is @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@. This value may be null.
CarrierMessagingService.SendMultipartSms.Description: Constructs a SendMultipartSmsResult with the send status and message references for the just-sent multipart SMS.

ClassDesc: The result of sending a multipart SMS.
